snippet: The company benefited from revenue growth at Turner and HBO, two businesses that together account for more than half of Time Warner’s total revenue.
abstract: Time Warner reports revenue of $7.53 billion in quarter ended in December, 2014, slightly lower figure than $7.55 billion analysts had expected.
lead_paragraph: The company benefited from revenue growth at Turner and HBO, two businesses that together account for more than half of Time Warner’s total revenue.

headline.main: Time Warner’s Profit Bolstered by Cable Subscription Fees
headline.print_headline: Cable Subscription Fees Bolster Time Warner’s Profit
